compliant.section:
13.2.3  您可以請求補充、更正、刪除、停止處理或利用本人的個人資料，我們會在取得您所提供、足以處理該要求的充分資訊後：
(a)   於30天內處理完成；以及
(b)   因可歸責Shopee之事由需更正或補充個人資料者，我們將於更正或補充後依法通知曾提供利用之對象。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to rectification, Right to erasure, Right to restriction of processing

compliant.section: 14.1  如果您對於我們的隱私權作法有任何問題或疑慮，請逕行聯絡： dpo.tw@shopee.com
compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, Right to information

non_compliant.section: 如果我們不能在前述的15天內對您做出回應，我們會通知您最快能將您所要求的資訊提供給您的時間。若該等資料已不再由我們持有或保管（例如在蒐集之特定目的消失或期限屆滿後的個人資料），我們可能無法處理或完成您的請求。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to access, Right to information
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the reasons why the request cannot be fulfilled, and provide a clear timeline for the response. It should also specify the criteria for determining whether the data is no longer held or stored.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject, Information to be provided where personal data are not obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should include a clear and concise description of the data processing activities, including the purposes of the processing, the categories of data processed, the recipients of the data, and the data retention periods.
